PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-15912009-09-17,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNRC- Administrative Services** COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL CANADA to enter into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the RESEARCH COUNCIL EMPLOYEES ASSOCIATION covering all the employees in the Administrative Services Bargaining Unit, which agreement expires on April 30, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
